title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/remove-states
name: Remove States
description: Remove all state tiddlers. Simple UI
author: Mario Pietsch
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/remove-states":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/remove-states","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/WikiLabs","caption":"Remove States","text":"\define theFilter() [prefix[$:/state/]] \end <$button> <$action-deletetiddler $filter=<> /> <$set name="tv-wikilinks" value="no"> Delete all: <> tiddlers <$list filter=<> > <$button> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> x - <$link to=<> ><$text text=<> />
"},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/remove-states/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/remove-states/history","text":"V 1.0.0 - 2024.04.18 * Settings are now in $:/ControlPanel -> ''Settings'' -> ''WikiLabs'' tab V 0.1.5 - 2003-07-01 * supress auto wikilinking for button text V 0.1.4 - 2022-03-27 * update to TW v5.2.2 V 0.1.4 - 2022-03-27 * update to TW v5.2.2 V 0.1.3 - 2020-12-25 * update license "},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/remove-states/license":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/remove-states/license","text":"[[Remove-States-Plugin|https://wikilabs.github.io/#remove-states]] (c) Mario Pietsch - 2016-2024 https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause "},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/remove-states/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/remove-states/readme","text":"! Overview This plugin creates a simple UI, to remove all state tiddlers. ! Simple UI [[$:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/remove-states]] {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/remove-states}} "},"$:/ControlPanel/Settings/WikiLabs":{"title":"$:/ControlPanel/Settings/WikiLabs","caption":"WikiLabs","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/SettingsTab","text":"Get an overview about all [[WikiLab Pugins|https://wikilabs.github.io]]
<$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ControlPanel/WikiLabs]!has[draft.of]]" default="$:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/remove-states" explicitState="$:/state/tab/settings/wikilabs" />
"}}}
